text: Mahmudpura is a village located in the Ludhiana West tehsil, of Ludhiana district, Punjab. ==Administration== The village is administrated by a Sarpanch who is an elected representative of village as per constitution of India and Panchayati raj (India). {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Particulars !! Total !! Male!!Female |- | Total No. of Houses||126|| || |- | Population ||720||389||331 |- |} ==Villages in Ludhiana West Tehsil== ==Air travel connectivity== The closest airport to the village is Sahnewal Airport. ==References== ==External links== * Villages in Ludhiana West Tehsil Category:Villages in Ludhiana West tehsil
title: Mahmudpura
